医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
非洲国家必须主导艾滋病毒应对工作，以减轻疾病负担非洲领导的艾滋病毒控制工作组联合主席伊祖坎吉·西卡兹韦（Izukanji Sikazwe）和玛格达·罗巴洛（Magda Robalo）写道，非洲必须掌控艾滋病毒应对工作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/African-nations-must-take-ownership-of-HIV-response-to-reduce-disease-burden.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/African-nations-must-take-ownership-of-HIV-response-to-reduce-disease-burden.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d3ab822-1cc8-46ef-86da-5d0a37176d52 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 09:46:00 -0400 African nations must take ownership of HIV response to reduce disease burden
NCCN 和 LACOG 合作加强南美洲的癌症护理美国领先癌症中心联盟国家综合癌症网络® (NCCN®) 宣布与拉丁美洲合作肿瘤学小组 (LACOG) 重新合作，以改善南美洲的癌症结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/NCCN-and-LACOG-collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-care-in-South-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/NCCN-and-LACOG-collaborate-to-enhance-cancer-care-in-South-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=57d9f8ba-950e-476c-a760-9fc8774a74fb Wed, 09 Oct 2024 09:40:55 -0400 NCCN and LACOG collaborate to enhance cancer care in South America
共同努力对于解决非洲痴呆症至关重要随着人口老龄化，痴呆症正在成为非洲的一个主要公共卫生问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Collaborative-efforts-essential-for-tackling-dementia-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Collaborative-efforts-essential-for-tackling-dementia-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f57ece34-b332-4743-b205-5796983e7432 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 09:37:37 -0400 Collaborative efforts essential for tackling dementia in Africa
咖啡因对健康有益的新科学一项研究揭示了咖啡因通过改善系统性红斑狼疮患者的内皮功能和 EPC 存活来增强心脏健康的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/The-new-science-behind-the-health-benefits-of-caffeine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/The-new-science-behind-the-health-benefits-of-caffeine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=41e0e959-afc5-43e1-a2c3-4d7d97edb660 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 09:19:00 -0400 The new science behind the health benefits of caffeine
微小分子为减少阿片类药物副作用带来希望阿片类药物在缓解疼痛方面非常有效，但也有严重的缺点。它们的副作用包括头晕和可能致命的呼吸抑制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Tiny-molecule-offers-hope-in​​-reducing-opioid-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Tiny-molecule-offers-hope-in​​-reducing-opioid-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10acec60-a571-4b54-9be2-e70298a83350 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 09:00:53 -0400 Tiny molecule offers hope in reducing opioid side effects
研究：爱吃甜食的人患抑郁症、糖尿病和中风的风险更高萨里大学的最新研究表明，偏爱甜食的人患抑郁症、糖尿病和中风的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-People-with-a-sweet-tooth-at-higher-risk-of-developmenting-depression-diabetes-and-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Study-People-with-a-sweet-tooth-at-higher-risk-of-developmenting-depression-diabetes-and-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=71825391-5f7f-47f3-b447-7f96282c13f1 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:48:32 -0400 Study: People with a sweet tooth at higher risk of developing depression, diabetes, and stroke
减肥手术可以降低肥胖人群患胰腺癌的风险肥胖和2型糖尿病是多种恶性肿瘤的危险因素，其中包括死亡率很高的胰腺癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Weight-loss-surgery-may-reduce-pancreatic-cancer-risk-in-people-with-obesity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Weight-loss-surgery-may-reduce-pancreatic-cancer-risk-in-people-with-obesity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b1e53fc-611f-45a6-9c7e-f7af9aa6b695 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:42:25 -0400 Weight-loss surgery may reduce pancreatic cancer risk in people with obesity
孕产妇死亡和死亡率监测的时空趋势分析显示，错误分类的孕产妇死亡人数可能会扭曲美国的死亡率统计数据，这凸显了准确的死亡证明报告的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Spatiotemporal-trends-in-maternal-deaths-and-mortality-surveillance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Spatiotemporal-trends-in-maternal-deaths-and-mortality-surveillance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=40dd726b-92e7-480a-b84d-2325807cc32e Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:41:00 -0400 Spatiotemporal trends in maternal deaths and mortality surveillance
户外活动可降低儿童肥胖风险发表在《儿科学报》上的新研究表明，在学龄前从事户外活动的儿童在童年后期患肥胖症的风险较低。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Outdoor-play-linked-to-lower-obesity-risk-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Outdoor-play-linked-to-lower-obesity-risk-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a616d1e-216a-4320-994c-64692d98d0b2 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:37:51 -0400 Outdoor play linked to lower obesity risk in children
肾移植可及性方面的民族和种族差异该研究强调了个性化治疗的迫切需要，以解决每个民族和种族群体在肾移植护理过程中遇到的独特挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ethnic-and-racial-disparities-in-accessibility-to-kidney-transplants.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20241009/Ethnic-and-racial-disparities-in-accessibility-to-kidney-transplants.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c3226ab-300b-42ef-89a6-c285ff6d5766 Wed, 09 Oct 2024 08:16:00 -0400 Ethnic and racial disparities in accessibility to kidney transplants
